posts.content:
Where:
Sandown Park, Esher. KT10 9AJ

Website: http://www.volksworldshows.com/volks-world-show-home

Inner line up: The Volskworld Show is nearly upon us yet again, which means another club displayâ€¦.. So I am looking for buses to show in the line-up. If you'd like to participate at the shown for the whole weekend or just Saturday or just Sunday, please add your self to the list below. Buses can be removed from the club line up each evening to camp in if you wish to do so.

Outer line up: Also I am organising the usual over-spill line up just to the left of the main entrance, again if you own a bus please park it here if you cant get in or are late coming.

Please feel free to forward this post on to any appropriate social media sites etc

All the best and see you at the show

Cheers Rikki (07802 884 583)

Attendance list:
